film.name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail

comic.name: Graham Chapman
comic.quote: No! Not the Knights Who Say Ni!

comic.name: John Cleese
comic.quote: Ask me the questions, Bridgekeeper. I am not afraid.

comic.name: Terry Gilliam
comic.quote: AAAAAAUUGH!! (Boris falls as his head rolls off his body from the rabbits attack.)

comic.name: Terry Jones
comic.quote: How do you know she is a witch?

comic.name: Eric Idle
comic.quote: Thats, er, thats enough music for now lads. Looks like theres dirty work afoot.

quote.character: Leader of The Knights who say NI!
